title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Information Protection - Automatically turn on auto-labeling policy
description:
Admins can configure their auto-labeling policies to be automatically turned on if there aren't any changes to the policy within a set number of days from simulation completion. This configuration has rolled out via cmdlet. We are still in the process of rolling this out in the auto-labeling policy setup in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/exchange/set-autosensitivitylabelpolicy?view=exchange-ps
